attributes.action: Get BT to Phase Out ISDN Lines completely and replace them with Fibre Optic Cables
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BT should be made to phase out their ISDN Lines and replace them all with
Fibre Optic Cables, as these are much faster than ISDN Cables

BT should start doing it this year
and finish by the year 2017
or when complete
